locs.name: Abandoned Town
locs.description: The first town you discover upon arriving in the world of Animelee, filled to the brim with undead monsters.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Lesser Phantom, Greater Phantom, Umbral Demon, Skeleton Lancer, Fallen Hero; Castle Lord, Skeleton Archer, Skeleton Tank.

locs.name: Town Underground
locs.description: The rotting space underneath the abandoned town, home to creepy crawlies of all kinds.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Sewer Ghouls, King of the Underground, Skeletal Dragon, Nightmare Slime.

locs.name: Crater-born Valley
locs.description: A mysterious, massive crater previously housing the unholy spire yet now somehow empty.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Flame beast, Valley Knight, Chaos Soul Magus, Black Arcanist.

locs.name: Holy Suspended laboratory
locs.description: The odd building housing the main scientific force of the Holy Order, aswell as home to the arch-bishop.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Holy Knight, Seiyusael; Angel of Duality, Nightmare Golem, Arch-Bishop; Holy Incarnate, Holy Inquisitor, Grand Crusader.

locs.name: Sunken City
locs.description: The ruins of a once great civilization, housing unknown magic and creatures.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Deepsea Protector, Sunken Guardian, Sewer Ghouls, Nightmare Slime

locs.name: Scorching Desert
locs.description: A dessert left behind in the wake of a changing world, full of monsters and secrets.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Keeper of the Flame, Imp, Protector of the Flame, Blaze incarnate; Sol, Scorched Guardian.

locs.name: Cult of Undeath
locs.description: A hidden fortress in a sinister valley, home to all kinds of dark worshiping experiments.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Cultist of Undeath, Priest of Undeath, Experiment Unleashed: Gargoyl, Unshackled Abomination; Angel's Death, Keeper of Death, Reaper of Soul

locs.name: Flying City
locs.description: Another renmant of a now fractured world, the ruins of a city that once floated through the sky.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Feathered Serpent, Gaseous Reaper, Wind Rider, Soaring Guardian

locs.name: Edge of Vortex: Abyss
locs.description: A firey pit deep underground bordering the spinning vortex leaking dark energies into the world.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Bloodcrystal Titan, Diamond Titan, Mantle Incarnate, Expression of Void.

locs.name: Crystal Tomb
locs.description: The resting place of heroes from the annals of history, resting for days yet to come..
locs.spawnlisttxt: Hero of the Holy Light: Imperitus, Hero of the Holy Light: Asphur, Hero of the Holy Light: Aethel.

locs.name: Vampire Infested Nagoya
locs.description: A ruined city taken from the humans.

locs.name: Spaceless Twilight
locs.description: The world between worlds, the space between space, the tomb of the forgotten.
locs.spawnlisttxt: Mirror of Worlds, Realm Keeper, Realm Hunter

dungeons.name: Underground Dungeon
dungeons.description: Upon further exploration, you find a hidden catacomb in the underground, but it requires a key..
dungeons.storyend: The spectre falls to your might, although a powerful spirit cannot be kept down for long...

dungeons.name: Scoarched Dungeon
dungeons.description: A mysterious building rises from the sands, the great door standing in your way seems to require a key..
dungeons.storyend: The maiden falls in a radiant blaze, however the embers of a mighty flame seldom do not blow back to life...

dungeons.name: Soaring Dungeon
dungeons.description: Far above even the flying city, a tower shrouded in clouds whistles locked shut.
dungeons.storyend: The ancient wind falls, his body turned to stone before your very eyes, the winds around the tower have not dissapated however..

dungeons.name: Crystal Tomb
dungeons.description: The resting place of ancient heroes, now resonating with the energy of soul.
dungeons.storyend: The hero falls to the tomb floor, the entire structure fading away in sparkling light, leaving you returned to the crystal caverns.

dungeons.name: Tomb of The Twilight Echo
dungeons.description: Surrounded in a blood red mist, the tomb holds a powerful Echo from other worlds..
dungeons.storyend: The crimson mist swirls across the brokem echo, parting to leave nothing but an empty cave...

dungeons.name: Altar of the SKy
dungeons.description: A place near the ozone, where a legendary pokemon is said to dwell.
dungeons.storyend: Ichigo falls unconcious, his heart replaced.
